website_summaries.verdict: Folgers has been a popular brand for well over 150 years, and continues to be a top pick among consumers who want great tasting coffee for an affordable price.
pros: Offers reliable quality, balanced flavor and exceptional value that the brand has been known for since it was established
The plastic canister also earns praise for making it easy to store and keeps the coffee fresh
cons: Nothing fancy, but the price and classic aroma and flavor is good for most coffee drinkers

customer_reviews.title: Good coffee, convenient to have subscribe & save!
customer_reviews.text: My hubby wanted to donate to their office coffee stash and so we subscribed and saved for these so he wouldn't forget to bring in his contribution. The coffee smelled fresh and tasted good; much better than the average 'office coffee'. We're getting this three pack every 4 months for his M-F office needs.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Blevins

customer_reviews.title: Good coffee
customer_reviews.text: I would rather have the largest sized containers but they aren't available now due to the Covid 19 thing so bought these. These 6 containers will last me a couple months but I want to stock up each month on these anyway in case there is a global lockdown.
customer_reviews.author: Darryl Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what you'd expect
customer_reviews.text: Its folgers. If really need more of an explanation than that, maybe you should look for something fancier. This is straight, basic coffee. Exactly what coffee should be.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Folgers!
customer_reviews.text: My family loves Folgers classic roast coffee. I think these are a better value than the bigger 48 ounce cans, or 30 ounce cans, because you actually get more coffee. Each can is 22 ounces, and it is a pack of three cans, so you are actually getting 66 ounces of coffee. The flavor is rich, definitely worthy of its name. Smells wonderful when perking, definitely a great part of my day.
customer_reviews.author: Quipster

customer_reviews.title: Small containers
customer_reviews.text: The container is much smaller than I thought. I was expecting to get ones like the large containers at the local store so a bit disappointed in that.
customer_reviews.author: Charity Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Folgers
customer_reviews.text: Good price and fast delivery. My favorite coffee (I drink it every morning) so nothing not to like there. I appreciated the price and the fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: The Cat

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that the lid comes off when ready to make coffee. I also like the fact that the lid goes back on when you are through.
customer_reviews.author: Papa

customer_reviews.title: classic
customer_reviews.text: this hasn't been around this long because people don't like it, there is a reason they sell this by the truckload.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan M.

customer_reviews.title: Save money save time save gas its a win win win
customer_reviews.text: I love the flavor of Classic roast Folgers coffee been without it for a week and wasn't gunna go to the store just for coffee so I got it on here and I got a 3 pack for 15 bucks lot cheaper than most stores around me except for Meijer its about the same price there but you're not wasting gas and you don't have to wait for the customer in the checkout line with the newspaper of coupons lol.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Fine Fresh Fragrance !
customer_reviews.text: Did someone say coffee is life? ☺️This fresh Folger's may not solve all of life's problems but it will make enduring them more pleasant! The aroma alone will cheer you! I use a French Press that not only reveals the coffee's fine flavor, it uses less coffee and is easier on your grocery budget? ☕ Cheers!
customer_reviews.author: nowelle ross

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal but Coffee Expires in Less than a Month
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my parents since they love this brand and are big coffee drinkers. Was disappointed to learn that the expiration date is this month. Purchased on 10/4 and expires 10/2020. Hoping they get to enjoy some of the coffee, but wouldn't recommend purchasing and won't buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Krom

customer_reviews.title: Love Having This In My Pantry
customer_reviews.text: I guess I am getting paranoid, but I love knowing I have coffee in my pantry and not out searching if times get weird and there is no coffee around. Cannot imagine not having coffee first thing in the morning. I have purchased this brand for years so this purchase (twice already) is for my convenience and peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: Patrice T.

customer_reviews.title: Subscription is great!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I prefer Folgers to the other standard coffees. With the subscription, I never have to worry about running out. Had to adjust it one for it to come monthly instead of every 2 months (didn’t know we drank that much!) but since then, it’s been great!
customer_reviews.author: Mele

customer_reviews.title: Right box wrong product
customer_reviews.text: It says classic medium roast, the label on the box said classic medium roast but it was actually black silk dark roast . Right box, wrong product inside. I will keep it to try it but if I don’t like it, I know someone who will enjoy it. Hopefully it was a fluke and your order will be ok. Best wishes
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth

customer_reviews.title: Tiny, tiny, tiny
customer_reviews.text: Very small containers. I thought I was getting a great deal until I seen how little they were. Live and learn, Amazon is not the place to buy coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Drake

customer_reviews.title: Favorite everyday coffee at an excellent price.
customer_reviews.text: We've used this for years and usually get it in the grocery store but as we limit outside home excursions, this delivery option is wonderful. Thanks, Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon S.

customer_reviews.title: love Folger's Coffee
customer_reviews.text: Love Folger's Coffee and this size is great The price is outstanding also. This packaging, 6 in a case is great. Love everything about this order.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Howerton

customer_reviews.title: It's coffee...
customer_reviews.text: High quality coffee? No. But it gets the job done when you have 5 coffee drinkers in the house and a better quality coffee would mean taking on another job.
customer_reviews.author: Joel R. Geer

customer_reviews.title: Coffee ☕️
customer_reviews.text: 100% GREAT BUY I love the coffee Not only relate good Also like is the size ... they come in ☕️Wrapped n shipped well thank you
customer_reviews.author: Cytygrl

customer_reviews.title: Good coffee and a great value in a 6 pack on subscribe and save
customer_reviews.text: This is our favorite coffee. These are a great buy in a 6 pack on subscribe and save, and the empty cans fit perfectly under the seat in our pickup as an emergency can for when the kid gets nauseated on a car trip.
customer_reviews.author: Idaho Family

customer_reviews.title: never out of coffee
customer_reviews.text: now with this 3 pack, i never run out. Amazon has trouble getting my other coffee to me. This will do just fine.
customer_reviews.author: annette reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Great bundle
customer_reviews.text: Was happy to find the expiration was over a year out, that was my main concern. Haven't had folgers in awhile, but tastes good.
customer_reviews.author: CARL DIFRANCESCO

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift. The person was pleasantly surprised. I like that it was vacuum sealed so it was easier to wrap
customer_reviews.author: Dog lady

customer_reviews.title: Taste ok
customer_reviews.text: Ok coffee. The price is very budget friendly but the flavor isn’t as good as some other name brands.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: It great coffee
customer_reviews.text: Best part of waking up is full coffee empty home.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur All Mighty

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: Great coffee at a great price. Why go shopping and pay at least twice. Just get it delivered
customer_reviews.author: Brian J Paquin

customer_reviews.title: Good price. No problems.
customer_reviews.text: Fast Prime shipping. Good price. All cans foiled sealed in place. 👍
customer_reviews.author: Martine A.

customer_reviews.title: Ummm it’s Folgers!  Yea it’s good.
customer_reviews.text: Not much I can say about this. Folgers coffee is great and consistent.
customer_reviews.author: R. Petry

customer_reviews.title: 3 pack
customer_reviews.text: I like ordering in the three pack - cost effective and last a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's good
customer_reviews.text: Liked it, delivered late and driver lied about date of delivery
customer_reviews.author: LiL Bit Sweet

customer_reviews.title: YOU GET MORE FOR YOUR MONEY HONEY
customer_reviews.text: WE GO THROUGH LOTS OF COFFEE WITH ALL THE WORKERS ON THE FARM. THIS IS GREAT FOR THEM.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: Folgers ... what's more to say
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this, for my husband to mix is own blend with Italian ground coffee. It arrived in good condition. Happy husband, Happy wife. Thanks Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Ok I put my Folgers in a Starbucks mug and it tastes good.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Gourmet taste without the gourmet price
customer_reviews.text: There are store brands, and then there's Folgers. I choose Folgers!
customer_reviews.author: cottonballmama

customer_reviews.title: Work
customer_reviews.text: Co-workers have been pleased with the coffee and have enjoyed having a whole collection of bricks ready to go.
customer_reviews.author: Paul S. Greene

customer_reviews.title: big coffee deal
customer_reviews.text: nice size can. pack tight coffee was fresh a great deal
customer_reviews.author: eloise  coles

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what you would expect - cost similar to Costco
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what you would expect - cost similar to Costco
customer_reviews.author: Sam Michelson

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great
customer_reviews.text: Simple and beautiful flavor. Not very fancy and expensive but it does its job. The best tasting coffee you'll find.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Martin

customer_reviews.title: Good buy , for good coffee!
customer_reviews.text: Great price ! Really enjoy this coffee . Glad to get it here on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Paulson , .

customer_reviews.title: Great value - great coffee!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this coffee is great! It's nothing amazingly fancy, but for the price it's an incredible wake-up coffee. :-) I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: value
customer_reviews.text: Where I live in Hawaii, Folgers is a bit pricey. Amazon price is good
customer_reviews.author: richard

customer_reviews.title: cheap option and will certainly buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a super cheap option. Maybe it's my machine's problem but the coffee is not super strong. But will still buy again!
customer_reviews.author: JJPineapple

customer_reviews.title: Gr. Coffee set of 3, #1 full, #2 half full, #3 ???
customer_reviews.text: Second canister of 3 was only partly full, short almost 7 ounces. The first one was fine as labeled. The third canister not opened yet. What product control is there when ordering quantities?
customer_reviews.author: Abena

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee!
customer_reviews.text: This is my husband’s. We noticed the the other day that size/aount has lessened, BUT he loves his Folgers!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Value in fractions and you guys exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: I love my Folgers coffee oh man that is Good Friday they get it there promptly it's always precious great coffee that's good value for the money I highly advise buying the 6 can"s. & you won't be sorry
customer_reviews.author: Baldwin Osko

customer_reviews.title: Convenient size 3 pack lasts & stays fresh
customer_reviews.text: Use for house but gave 1away to friend who needed it -everyone happy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: I am a repeat buyer and will continue to purchase. Excellent product and price
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen A. Dalton

customer_reviews.title: I like it to travel with
customer_reviews.text: A little pricey,could be the same price as coffee in the containers . I like it to travel with , so i dont have to drink hotel coffee in the room.

customer_reviews.title: Great Coffee!
customer_reviews.text: Great coffee, great value. Why would I ever need to a store, when I can get this so fast to my home!

customer_reviews.title: Love this coffee
customer_reviews.text: I love having it sent to me monthly I never run out

customer_reviews.title: A big price break from my local grocery store !!
customer_reviews.text: I love not carrying them from the grocery store with my bad back.

customer_reviews.title: Favorite morning coffee
customer_reviews.text: This is our everyday coffee. Nice medium flavor. Good coffee for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Alan's Girl

customer_reviews.title: Folgers is Always Good
customer_reviews.text: The product came promptly and as advertised. Folgers is a great coffee. this was one of the best prices I could find.
customer_reviews.author: Richard J. Nolle

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee, great price, free delivery!
customer_reviews.text: I have to drink my coffee every morning. This is a fantastic price and it is delivered to the house for free. I won't run out or look for a sale.
customer_reviews.author: MonsterTruckNana

customer_reviews.title: Prefer larger size
customer_reviews.text: Prefer the larger size. Don't appreciate y'all changong availability on items I order.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Good coffee
customer_reviews.text: Our favorite kind. A bit spendy, tho, for the amount you get
customer_reviews.author: Patti Jibben

customer_reviews.title: Your price is just as good as any ware. I got prime free shipping so I order 6 at a time
customer_reviews.text: Folgers has been my favorite brand for 50 years. Love the plastic containers keeps coffee fresh and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: charles ekstrom

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee!
customer_reviews.text: Love Folgers coffee. Love the container it comes in too.
customer_reviews.author: Dawnmarie

customer_reviews.title: It's Folgers Coffee !!!
customer_reviews.text: It was fresh, not much more to say. Folgers is Folgers.
customer_reviews.author: Double D

customer_reviews.title: Great value and good for the economy
customer_reviews.text: Great value and good for the economy. I love Folgers coffee! I hate to buy the big plastic canisters because they don't break down in our land fills. So ..... whenever possible, I opt. for reduced packaging. I can't find them anywhere in our stores here so I was so glad to find them at a good price here on Amazon. Hope they will continue to offer them.
customer_reviews.author: cinder

customer_reviews.title: Not the right coffee and smaller size
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 6 containers of 30 ounce classic medium.. I received 6 of 24 ounce black classic dark..impossible to return once i opened.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen B. Brandt

customer_reviews.title: Always good
customer_reviews.text: Good price, good product, and do not have to leave the house to get it.
customer_reviews.author: John M.

customer_reviews.title: It is my favorite coffee.
customer_reviews.text: I use to drink this kind of coffee and the price was fair and delivery very fast. I like it
customer_reviews.author: rene munoz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: The favor, aroma & price excellent choice I Made. Will last me a while. Julia ( Delaware )
customer_reviews.author: Julia Minus

customer_reviews.title: It is good to the last drop
customer_reviews.text: What can I say about Folgers. It is good to the last drop.

customer_reviews.title: Damaged product!
customer_reviews.text: 2 of the 12 bricks of coffee were damaged. Seal of brick was broken!

customer_reviews.title: Good price.
customer_reviews.text: I been buying this product from a long time, i like the brand and the taste of the coffee.

customer_reviews.title: Good coffee, good value
customer_reviews.text: What can you say....Coffee in bulk at a great price! Thanks

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!!
customer_reviews.text: Its coffee and cheaper than you can get at store. AWESOME!!!!

customer_reviews.title: Nothing like Folgers in your cup!!
customer_reviews.text: Nothing like Folgers in your cup. Smooth. Great taste. Loved everything about it.

customer_reviews.title: Flavor/richness
customer_reviews.text: Its the perfect blend to had some cinnamon to and brew!

customer_reviews.title: Good taste
customer_reviews.text: It is good , with little bitter taste, It have three box in the package!

customer_reviews.title: Older Product
customer_reviews.text: Packaged at least a year prior to my receiving it based on the 'Best By' date. Where has it been for a year?

customer_reviews.title: ... to coast they brag and boast about the most excellent Folgers Classic Roast
customer_reviews.text: Let me post that from coast to coast they brag and boast about the most excellent Folgers Classic Roast. Not too strong, not too light. Great for mornings, afternoons, or night. Charismatic COFFEE Dramatic Ecstatic
customer_reviews.author: Reid Wells

customer_reviews.title: COFFEE IS FINE, I THOUGHT THIS WAS A 33 OZ AND ...
customer_reviews.text: COFFEE IS FINE , I THOUGHT THIS WAS A 33 OZ AND REALLY NOT IMPRESSED WITH PRICE GIVEN I CAN PAY SAME AMOUNT FOR A 33.9 OZ SIZE. WON'T MAKE SAME MISTAKE TWICE.
customer_reviews.author: CMW

customer_reviews.title: The best major brand coffee
customer_reviews.text: I order multipacks of Folgers all the time. It's our favorite coffee and we go through it like water. I order the 6-packs of cans and they always arrive fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica M.

customer_reviews.title: BEST COFFEE AND WORTH THE MONEY
customer_reviews.text: BEST COFFEE AND WORTH THE MONEY AND TASTE. ARRIVES ON OR BEFORE TIME GREAT FLAVOR

product_meta.title: Folgers Classic Roast Medium Roast Ground Coffee, 22.6 Ounces (Pack of 3)
product_meta.description: Style:Canister| Size:22.6 Ounce (Pack of 3)Wake up to the fresh aroma of Folgers Classic Roast coffee. Each sip delivers the rich, smooth flavor that’s been brewing for generations. Experience the timeless tradition of Folgers in every cup.
feature_bullets: Contains 3 - 22.6 Ounce Canisters of Ground Coffee
Medium roasts offer robust taste and full flavor.
Interlocking AromaSeal canister seals tight to lock in freshness
Our Folgers coffee is roasted in New Orleans, Louisiana

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
